Job Position: Electrical Technician

Job Location:&nbsp;Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	The Electrical Technician&nbsp;is responsible for installing, maintaining, and repairing electrical systems and equipment. This includes wiring, lighting, control systems, and industrial machinery.
	The role demands technical expertise, safety awareness, and the ability to troubleshoot and resolve electrical issues efficiently.


Key Responsibilities


	Install and maintain electrical wiring, fixtures, and control systems in residential, commercial, or industrial buildings
	Read and interpret blueprints, technical diagrams, and electrical schematics
	Diagnose and troubleshoot electrical faults using tools like multimeters and circuit testers
	Repair or replace faulty components such as switches, outlets, motors, and circuit breakers
	Conduct routine inspections and preventive maintenance on electrical systems
	Ensure all installations comply with Nigerian electrical codes and safety standards
	Collaborate with engineers, contractors, and other technicians on site projects
	Respond to emergency electrical issues and provide timely solutions
	Maintain accurate records of repairs, inspections, and installations
	Advise management on system upgrades and energy efficiency improvements


Skills &amp; Qualifications


	OND, HND, or Trade Test Certificate in Electrical Engineering or related field
	Minimum of 2&ndash;3 years of hands-on experience in electrical maintenance or installation
	Strong knowledge of Nigerian electrical codes and safety regulations
	Ability to work with hand and power tools
	Good communication and problem-solving skills
	Physical stamina and ability to work in challenging environments.


Method of Application
